title: What's your top 5 favorite Pokemon

replies.body: Mine are: Badass Greninja, Piplup and it's evolutions, Staraptor(I love the sound Staravia makes on its entrance in the game lol), Pikachu(mainstream) and all the good HM slaves. I don't care too much about stats.

replies.body:
1.Greninja

My favourite since it came out. Protean Set died when it went to Ubers :(((

2. Mega Pidgeot/Pidgeot

I love late game cleaning by spamming never miss hurricanes. Nice that they gave a regional bird a mega.

3. Espeon

My favourite Eeveelution. I just really like it's design. And it hits really hard. Calm Mind stored power with Magic Bounce. rip

4. Hydreigon 

The pseudo legendary that grew on me when I played through White. Dies to fairies though, Flash Cannon ain't strong enough. Still wall breaks decently with Draco.

5. Talonflame

Ayyyyy my Flame Body and Fly egg hatcher. Gale wings is amazing, but that 81 base attack stat holds it back so much.

None of these are in order but Greninja, who was my favourite since it came out. Just came up with the list on the spot lol





"Kanye region"

replies.body:
1. Chandelure (this thing is a BEAST with scarf)
2. Clefable (my favourite fairy-type: it can do some serious damage with one cm + moonblast)
3. Mega Metagross (my go-to pokemon since it can sweep with good setups)
4. Dialga (Legendary, I know but I love its design)
5. Exploud (move pool is ok, but I just love using it since not many peeps expect it)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
5. Azumarill - Holy shit, this thing can actually do damage if it has the ability big power
4. Arcanine - Like Gary, I love this guy. Pretty strong and looks awesome
3. Scizor - This guy looks really cool and can get pretty lethal
2. Garchomp - Carries me through online battles. Has awesome HP, attack and speed
1. Blaziken - Harrison's Blaziken wrecks Ash (Ash is noob)

replies.body:
1. Mega Charizard X-This thing looks really cool and can do damage
2. Xerneas-It can do a ton of damage with the skill Geomancy and Moonblast
3. Dialaga-First legendary I got
4. Primal Groudon- This pokemon can use solar beam in one move (It's ability called 'Desolate Land' makes you use solar beam in one move) and is immune to Electric
5. Mega Salamander- This thing looks like a BEAST

replies.body:
4. Primal Groudon- This pokemon can use solar beam in one move (It's ability called 'Desolate Land' makes you use solar beam in one move)
Any Pokemon can use solar beam in one turn if Sunny Day is activated which desolated lands does.
